talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Leonidas Goblin$
We are Sparta Goblins!
We shall destroy the evil King Kuse Kuse!

$Leonidas Goblin$
I am King Leonidas, ruler of all the Sparta Goblins.
There used to be 300 of us but the evil King Kuse Kuse brought 500 mercenaries to crush my goblins!

$Leonidas Goblin$
This is our home! We, the Sparta Goblins will have our revenge on King Kuse Kuse!
? To fight the Kuse Kuse goblins, please enter via the Wonderful Theme Park entrance.
